answers.answer: Im due July 1st and i am miserable.... ive been so sick the last week and i can't do anything without feeling pain anymore
I'm due July 29th. I feel tired and moody all the time, but I have a wriggly little boy so he puts a smile on my face :)
My baby moves a lot too! I hate being pregnant!
Due july 28 but I think im going in round late june just a guess && I to have a lil busy body lol find myself smiling && in complete awwww !
It hurts when my baby moves. I like being a mother but I hate being pregnant!
Aww :( I love being pregnant and I will definitely miss my bump but really can't wait until I have my boy in my arms
Aww sorry to hear that but we dont have that much longer to go momma !
Due 7th July with another girl cannot wait to meet my girl my pregnancy has been fairly easy compared to my first
I'm due the 18th too!! I can't want to meet my son!
July 24 its a girl and i have pelvic pain
I'm due July 14th and have a strong feeling my girl will be born in June. I have some much discomfort in my pelvis cause she is head down and decided to keep her head in my pelvis :(
July 12 but that don't think I'll make it to july n I have preclamcia
I'm due July 30th with a girl. I'm feet okay aside from my feet swelling but I make sure to prop them up. My baby is Ms. Kick a lot but I love it ready to hold her.
I'm due July 4 but I can't help but think my lol girl wants to come sooner. Lol she better think twice though
Im due July 13th :) with my babygirl. Im a ftm and been diagnosed with gestational diabetes and preclamsia.  So I know ima have her early..
Due July 10th with my little man. Ready to meet him!
Glad to know that I'm not alone! I wanted a boy tho.. But I love my little girl!!

question: Anyone due in July. I'm due July 18th and I can't wait. I'm in a lot of pain everyday so I think I will have her early! Tell me when your due and how you feel.
title: July mommies???
